Plot Enhanced Network

Source: R/visualization_functions.R
plot_enhanced_network.Rd

Create publication-quality network visualizations using ggraph

Usage

plot_enhanced_network(
  network_obj,
  scale = 1,
  tau = 0.5,
  layout = "stress",
  node_size_var = "degree",
  edge_weight_var = "weight",
  color_scheme = "viridis"
)

Arguments

network_obj

Network object or adjacency matrix

scale

Integer scale parameter for network (default: 1)

tau

Numeric threshold parameter (default: 0.5)

layout

Character string specifying layout algorithm

node_size_var

Character string for node sizing variable

edge_weight_var

Character string for edge weight variable

color_scheme

Character string for color scheme

Value

ggplot2 object with network visualization
